resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104822</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104822</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206037</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Guide for Teaching About Coastal Wetlands</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anleitung für das Unterrichten über 
KüstenSumpfgebiete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guide pour enseigner au sujet des Marécages 
côtiers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia para ensinar sobre Wetlands litoral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida per l'istruzione circa Wetlands litoraneo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγός για τη διδασκαλία για τους παράκτιους 
υγρότοπους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guía para enseñar sobre Wetlands costero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students identify types of wetlands and understand the role of wetlands in controlling erosion, retaining water, filtering pollutants, and serving as nurseries for young organisms. The barrier islands, the Mississippi River, and the consequences of wetland loss are examined.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer kennzeichnen Typen von 
Sumpfgebieten und verstehen die Rolle von Sumpfgebieten in 
steuernabnutzung, in beibehaltenem Wasser, in 
filternverschmutzungsstoffen und im Dienen als Baumschulen für junge 
organismen. Die Sperre Inseln, der Mississippi Fluß und die 
Konsequenzen des Sumpfgebietverlustes werden überprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides identifient des types de 
marécages et comprennent le rôle des marécages l'érosion de 
contrôle, l'eau de retenue, les polluants de filtrage, et en servant 
de pépinières à de jeunes organizations. Les îles de 
barrière, le fleuve du Mississippi, et les conséquences de la perte 
de marécage sont examinés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas identificam tipos de 
wetlands e compreendem o papel dos wetlands na erosão controlando, na
água de retenção, em pollutants filtrando, e em servir como 
berçários para organismos novos. Os consoles da barreira, o 
rio de Mississippi, e as conseqüências da perda do wetland são 
examinados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti identificano i tipi di 
wetlands e capiscono il ruolo dei wetlands nell'erosione gestente, in 
acqua di ritegno, in sostanze inquinanti di filtrazione e nel servire 
come scuole materne per gli organismi giovani. Le isole della 
barriera, il fiume del Mississippi e le conseguenze di perdita del 
wetland sono esaminati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να προσδιορίσουν τους τύπους 
υγρότοπων και να καταλάβουν το ρόλο των υγρότοπων στον έλεγχο της
διάβρωσης, τη διατήρηση του ύδατος, το φιλτράρισμα των ρύπων, και
να χρησιμεύσει ως οι βρεφικοί σταθμοί για τους νέους οργανισμούς.
Τα νησιά εμποδίων, ο ποταμός του Μισισιπή, και οι συνέπειες
της απώλειας υγρότοπου εξετάζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas identifican tipos de
wetlands y entienden el papel de wetlands en la erosión que controla,
el agua de retención, agentes contaminadores de filtración, y servir
como cuartos de niños para los organismos jóvenes. Las islas 
de la barrera, el río de Mississippi, y las consecuencias de la 
pérdida del wetland se examinan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206037</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104822</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/guide-for-teaching-about-coastal-wetlands</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
